This episode I make some progress on my massive new modular cave tile set. I show you how I went about texturing and black mod podge coating over 100 tiles in a way that was efficient and not super annoying. 

Black Magic Base Coat Episode: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bR-tgtcuRPg&t=24s
